sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './EmployeeCard.css' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' function EmployeeCard({name,age,birthday,email,address,phonenumber,qualification,passport,citizen,religion,videolink}) { const birthdayFormatted = new Date(birthday) return (
Name: {name}
Age :{age}
Birthday :{birthday.split("T")[0] }
Email :{email}
Address :{address}
Phone Number :{phonenumber}
Qualification :{qualification}
Passport :{passport}
Citizen :{citizen}
Religion :{religion}
Video Link :{videolink}
) } export default EmployeeCard
